components.name: Frontend
components.description: Handles HTTP requests via ELB and web servers, serving dynamic content.

components.name: Backend
components.description: App servers that process business logic, access RDS and Elastic Cache, and trigger notifications.

components.name: Storage
components.description: S3 bucket for static assets, delivered globally through CloudFront.

components.name: Notification
components.description: SNS for system alerts and SES for transactional emails.

data_flows.description: DNS resolution directs user traffic to the ELB, which forwards requests to web servers.
Web servers forward application requests to app servers for processing.
App servers request static assets from S3 via CloudFront.
App servers publish events to SNS and send emails through SES.
